title: How NFTs are Changing the Sports Industry: The Association NFT, Curry Brand, and Basketball Headz
body:
## Key Takeaways

* At present, the volume of NFTs in the sports industry is still relatively small compared to GameFi and art, but with the involvement of NBA, NFL, FIFA and other top ten global sports leagues in NFTs and Web3-related businesses, the field is expected to grow.
* At this stage, most sports companies venture into NFTs by outsourcing, selling cards, and GameFi licensing. Some superstars also venture into Web3 using their popularity.
* Curry's Basketball Headz involves community and generation. NF3 Basketball will be launched on June 22 at 0.08 ETH. Additionally, Curry Brand collaborates with CyberKongz, HAPE, Smilesss and Chibi Dinos to launch special serums.

Recently, Curry won the NBA FMVP, and many people on Twitter claim "Curry is the first Boring Ape to win the NBA championship." To some extent, Curry's association with bored apes is a case of NFT's identity attributes, and this is just a glimpse of the trend. On a macroscopic level, this correlation actually corresponds to the linkage between the sports industry and Web3. This year, with the comeback of most professional leagues, the success of the Olympics, the World Cup craze, etc., we might witness an explosion of the sports industry into the Web3 space.

The sports industry's search for new and diversified changes advances the current crypto trend. On one hand, they hope to nurture a deeper emotional connection with fans and enhance their experiences. On the other hand, the sports industry and teams are looking for new streams of revenue as digitization grows and transforms.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/myq__8VCUNskczdT7s54a.png?height=5608&width=8382)

## Path 1: Outsourcing + Card Sales (NBA Series)

At present, NBA Top Shot remains one of the most successful examples of the NBA's venture into NFTs. This collection features highlights of NBA star athletes and turns them into NFTs for fans to buy, sell and trade. In addition, the project is also using NBA resources to develop new NFT-related opportunities, such as VIP NFTs and celebrity unpacking. Also, the NBA is attempting various Web3 integrations like The Association NFTs.

### Create Consumption Hierarchies with VIP Pass

In March, the NBA and NBA Top Shot partnered to create 1/1 NFTs for each team. These NFTs are designed for super fans. Those who hold these NFTs will be given VIP access to benefits including meeting 5 star athletes and getting access to every NBA All-Star Game series for 5 years. For each successful bidder, the platform also gives 51 top NBA NFTs, and each year the NBA League will also provide exclusive VIP merchandise packages, NBA All-Star jerseys, behind-the-scenes footage of the All-Star Game, photo opportunities, arena tours and other benefits.

Establishing a VIP NFT business signifies the official extension of customized NFT services to the sports market, and proves that the sports industry intends to create new consumption scenarios by classifying fans with NFTs.

![New York Knicks VIP NFT bid at $63,100.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dZ1V2pOE-e9zawV2VFbSX.png?height=289&width=1107)

### The Association NFT

Besides NBA Top Shot launching on Flow, the NBA also started an NFT-themed Twitter account in March this year, and announced its first NFT product on April 20: The Association. The Association is a product dedicated to Web3 users and focuses on real-time features and interactions. The project is on Ethereum and supports secondary market transactions on OpenSea.

![The first tweet of NBAxNFT.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/y-4T1z3NnBxpQ18c41JSK.png?height=218&width=1078)

![NFTs on OpenSea](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/_2bu_pTonXPEBylPDTzqT.png?height=410&width=1138)

Similar to Moonbirds, The Association uses a technology that alters the appearances of the athlete card NFTs according to the athlete's performance in the playoffs. There are a total of 24 conditions that can trigger card changes, such as shutouts, three pointers, etc. The introduction of this mechanism strengthens the nurturing attributes of the NFT. For users, they can purchase their favorite NFTs and expect gains in value, which will greatly enhance user engagement.

The Association is a demonstration of the integration between the NBA and the mainstream NFT market. Yet, this also exposes some existing concerns, such as contract loopholes and community operational issues. The Association is created by licensed NBA initiators and an outsourced team, therefore the initiators do not possess full control of the project, which is why holders share a sense of separationâ€”some of them own NBA NFTs on both Flow and Ethereum.

## Path 2: Brand Collaboration + GameFi Platform (Sorare)

Sorare is a soccer game that uses blockchain technology based on Ethereum. It enables players to purchase club- or league-certified NFT cards of soccer players and form their own teams to participate in matches in the game. Furthermore, Sorare's platform also introduces the card-drawing element where players make profits through secondary markets and NFT auctions.

![The Official Site of Sorare](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/gXEemgYOa-jGjERgIZcQ2.png?height=554&width=1068)

Sorare has created an on-chain soccer team managing system integrated with offline brands, and designed a new type of experience that features card activation, NFT trading, team competition and rewards. It also reinforces the connection between rewards and competitiveness by adopting a reward system. The system offers benefits, such as gifts and offline tickets, to top players so they will buy more NFTs.

![Rarity classifications of cards.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/P8zMdOLCouroYRR5FLIM3.png?height=679&width=1280)

### The Virtual + Reality Business Model

Unlike other GameFi projects, Sorare has been working commercially with sports organizations, including clubs and leagues. Currently, over 130 European soccer clubs have launched their own NFTs on the Sorare platform, including well-known European soccer clubs such as Bayern Munich, Juventus, Real Madrid and Liverpool.

To discover more commercial uses of NFTs, on February 4, Sorare invited developers to create a game with Sorare Legends and retired player cards on Game Jam. By creating an open API and establishing partnerships with other game developers, the value of the NFTs can be maximized.

Sorare attracted users by building a soccer GameFi platform, while vigorously promoting its own NFT trading platform and signing up with soccer organizations. At the same time, it opens up access to its own NFTs to encourage derivative works. In less than two years, the company is estimated to be worth over $1 billion. However, due to its high dependence on the Ethereum network, Sorare had to find solutions to optimize transaction speed and fees. In July last year, the company adopted solutions by StarkWare and then switched to ZK-rollups. These problems are inevitable for Sorare's business.

## Path 3: Personal brand + Community (Curry Brand)

### Integrating Celebrity Player Activities with Web3

Powered by Under Armour, Curry Brand will launch the cross-community NFT project Basketball Headz. In previous playoffs, the project team has done community building centered on Stephen Curry, such as the NFT MEETS NF3 campaign: every 3-pointer Curry scored in the playoff activates 9 NFTs for free minting in a limited time. Community-oriented activities tailored to the characteristics of the player are able to motivate fans effectively.

### Rewarding fans with NFTs

Curry Brand has not only attached community attributes to each campaign through Web3, but also rewarded Curry's loyal fans through NFT, such as releasing Curry's co-branded NFT in the virtual space. These sneakers have 5 levels of rarities and are "wearable" on Decentraland, The Sandbox, Gala Games and RKL. By attracting resources through celebrity IPs, project developers are able to better benefit their fans as well as make them feel proud of their community. Users with Genesis Curry Flow are empowered to the free mint of NF3 basketballs and combine them with IP Serums to create customized avatars for Basketball Headz.

![The Genesis Curry Flow Sneaker](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9NDoxArScp8wX8oenhCMh.png?height=198&width=1112)

### Community collaborations

In addition to building its own community, Curry Brand is planning to interact with other Web3 communities. Basketball Headz is their first step of the plan. Fans participate in Web3 activities related to Curry to obtain basketball NFTs. Then, using serum NFTs from community partners (CyberKongz, HAPE, Chibi Dinos, and Smilesss), owners can mutate their original NFTs. This is good in many ways, including making the game more interesting and utilizing the strengths of different Web3 communities.

![Collaborations with other communities](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6iNfvmxnH_PHWqg1c77DS.png?height=576&width=1280)

## Path 4: NFT-Based Sports Ecosystem + Fans DAO

### Why Ecosystem + DAO?

Most sports organizations would choose to partner up with various public chains to offer their NFTs, such as NBA on Flow and MLB on WAX. This practice binds fans to other public chains, making future development very limited.

For example, if the NBA intends to establish a GameFi project, would it be ideal to collaborate with Flow again? Other chains to consider are Solana and WAX. If they choose Solana this time, users may find the experience quite "disconnected", because collectibles are on Flow, gaming NFTs are on Solana, and social media avatars are on Ethereum. Even though cross-chain solutions are available, glitches will still need to be solved.

The sports industry is characterized by its wide range of businesses, diversity of roles, and resourcefulness. Hence, scattering businesses on multiple chains wouldn't be ideal for expansion and the construction of an economic system.

### NFT-Based Sports Ecosystem

In reality, the economic size of sports organizations is enormous and involves numerous business structures which include event content, media promotion, financial derivatives, etc. One of the ways to transfer the entire industry onto Web3 is to create the entertainment ecosystem. Not only does this enhance user experience, but it also forms a closed loop with its fan base, thus maximizing its value.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DYEAf4ORwCroM7XvLVYYl.png?height=900&width=1600)

As seen from the figure above, the integration of NFTs and sports involves a wide range of businesses:

* **Digital Tickets, Identity Verification**

  This includes conventional tickets and proof of offline events. The collectible value of NFTs makes tickets more versatile. For instance, get a celebrity DAO NFT by buying three tickets. When individual tickets or season tickets are bundled with NFTs, it becomes a financial product and investment tool. Also, long-term holders of quality tickets can be rewarded with new tickets. This model creates new revenue streams for ticket holders, teams, and leagues.
* **GameFi Based on Public Chains** 
 Issuing NFTs for developers, guilds and fans. For example, players holding Pass NFTs have access to a series of GameFi and in-game bonuses. Businesses share value through NFTs to greatly improve user experience and create a closed-loop economy of fan traffic.
* **Fan-based DAO Economy** Celebrities can issue their own subDAOs on the public chain and maintain it with NFT verification and token incentives. This allows for direct communication between fans and celebrities, as well as increases the income of the celebrities. With DAOs, the role of the fans may be further developed. Socios, for example, offers fans an experience that exceeds that of an ordinary fan. By purchasing tokens, fans are given access to the governance guaranteed by the DAO, voting rights to the naming of training locations, and choosing the song to be played when a player scores a goal. We can expect to see some core team functions being delegated to fans in the future.
* **Content Copyrights** 
 The sports industry generates a large amount of content. Such information can be recorded via NFTs and then displayed or utilized on the public chain.

## Conclusion

The discovery of commercial value cannot be separated from the exploration of NFT attributes. NFT's collectible attribute spawned NBA Top Shot; identity verification attribute spawned VIP Pass; game attribute spawned sports-related games like Sorare, and PFP community attribute spawned PFP communities based on superstar-centric consensus.

Currently, the sports industry is merely experimenting with NFTs. As more businesses transfer to Web3, and with the development of multi- and cross-chain technology, an entertainment ecosystem might await us in the future.

ğŸˆ **Hello my friends**

**This is Watell.**

**The project to be shared in the 16th issue** **of "WaTell's NFT Research" is: Aiko Virtual.**

**ğŸª Project Twitter:**

**Aiko Virtual** [@aikovirtual](https://twitter.com/aikovirtual)

[https://twitter.com/aikovirtual](https://twitter.com/aikovirtual)

**ğŸŠTotal amount of NFTs: 8888**

**ğŸŠMINT Date: 06.25**

**ğŸŠMINT price: Advanced whitelist 0.05ETH; public sale 0.1ETH**

**ğŸŠNumber of Official Push Fans: 38K**

**ğŸŠDiscord users: 27.2K**

**ğŸƒProject introduction:**

> ***Aikos*** *will come out in a never-before-seen concept, and its story will be full of lore and personality. Aikos is a being that needs to be felt with the heart - an expression that transcends written identity and rational thought, an aesthetic experience, an emotional expression.*

**Aiko** **Virtual** is a 2D PFP NFT project that exists on the Ethereum chain. Its goal is to create a premium brand IP that straddles the boundaries between art and fashion, digital and physical, East and West.

**Aiko** **Virtual** is a collection of 8,888 randomly generated NFTs. The series is divided into 3 races: **Human**, **Ronin** and **Robot**. The rarity of any given Aiko is determined by a unique combination of traits and races. In addition to a randomly combined set of traits, the collection will include rare **1/1 Aikos** with unique traits.

![Aiko Virtual Race Signs: Human, Ronin and Robot](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/E8EuO8ceGhbTahTlFaDu2.png?height=794&width=1519)

**[Vinne.art](https://twitter.com/vinneart)** is the lead artist and co-founder of **Aiko Virtual**. Vinne is an established digital artist who combines anime with cyberpunk, fashion and bold colors in a very personal style of art. In the past ten years of illustration career, Vinne has created countless creative works of art, which have captured the attention of more than half a million people around the world. Vinne is the creative mastermind behind the Aiko universe and continues to drive the development of Aiko Virtual with his unique and iconic style.

**[Kyo](https://twitter.com/dyinginkyoto)** is the lead designer and co-founder of **Aiko Virtual**. Kyo has nine years of experience as a designer, from traditional painting to various fashion projects. Of these, Kyo is best known for his "neo-y2k" style, which has earned him multiple accolades and publications, including **[Hypebeast](https://hypebeast.com/2021/10/midnight-rave-fall-winter-2021-lookbook-info)** and **[Lyrical Lemonade](https://lyricallemonade.com/p/get-refreshed-making-sense-of-guilty-gear-defining-hypertrance-and-an-ode-to-neo-y2k-design)**. A thoughtful fashion designer, Kyo has worked with fashion giants including **Shane Gonzales** (Midnight Studios), **Faze Banks** and **Mowalola**. Kyo is the creator of the Aiko Virtual brand identity and will be the main designer behind Aiko fashion.

![Aiko Virtual launch poster](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/80chstDA5Rn8hMD4Eb36V.png?height=2748&width=2088)

The launch of **Aiko** **Virtual** consists of three parts:

1. **< FIRST SALE (06/25) >** Advanced whitelist mint: Each wallet address can mint 6 Aiko Virtual NFTs, the mint price is 0.05ETH, the supply is limited to 3333 at this stage, and this stage will last for 8 hours **(East US 11am to 7pm standard time)**. < 
2. **SECOND SALE (06/25) >** Cooperative project whitelist mint: each wallet address can mint 3 Aiko Virtual NFTs, if you hold cooperative project NFTs and also have advanced whitelist, they will be mixed together, which means Therefore, if you mint 6 NFTs during the advanced whitelisting stage, you will no longer be able to participate in the mint at this stage. The marketing focus of **Aiko Virtual** will start from the following three aspects:

* ***official merchandiseï¼š***

**Aiko Virtual** will launch its first high-quality apparel collection, featuring physical versions of Aiko accessories and exclusive apparel. These items will be specially designed and available in limited quantities. All pieces will be handled by Aiko Virtual's makers, from the fabric and cut to the design and printing of each garment. Each piece will be crafted to the highest quality, with an emphasis on functional and cultural design.

* ***Support the artist***

**Aiko Virtual** sincerely believes that there are many untapped potential stars in the art world. While the quality of these artists' art is amazing, they often suffer from financial problems or suffering from marketing difficulties. Aiko Virtual hopes to help mediate these issues by including these artists into Aiko Virtual's community, purchasing their work, and giving it as a gift to community members to show Aiko Virtual's support for the arts. Additionally, Aiko Virtual will bring emerging artists into the NFT space by providing the necessary resources to start advertising campaigns on NFT marketplaces like **Opensea** or **Foundation**.

* ***offline activity***

**Aiko Virtual** plans to hold physical events to connect with the NFT community, including parties and governance sessions. Additionally, Aiko Virtual will host art-focused events around the world as a way to connect with international artists from Aiko and members of **Aikommunity**.

**ğŸ¨ Art style introduction:**

**Aiko** **Virtual's** art style is centered around **Cyber**â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹**Cute**, a unique and new aesthetic concept that is the result of years of hard work and focus on his personal craft by artist Vinne. Cyberâ€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹Cute combines futuristic technology with an anime vibe to create a unique look with wide appeal and a wider view. The overall look is agile and full of tension, full of futuristic sense of technology and classic elements of Japanese comics.

**Aiko** **Virtual's** goal is simple: to create a premium concept that straddles the boundaries between art and fashion, digital and physical, East and West, offering an Aiko art experience that goes beyond visuals. Aikos represents a never-before-seen concept, full of lore and personalization. Aiko Virtual wants to show the NFT world a different kind of generative 2D PFP NFT to date, and this will come entirely from Aiko Virtual's original style. Vinne has created more than 330 original features for the Aiko Virtual series, as far as possible to satisfy the needs of all NFT enthusiasts.

![Aiko Virtual NFT preview](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4xE4Cn43cixY-9wSJ5XlO.png?height=4027&width=4032&size=medium)

**Aiko** **Virtual** is a 2D PFP NFT project that combines two-dimensional comic style and cyber technology style. Its art design is at a high level. Although the roadmap is currently a bit thin, from the resume of the core team, Aiko Virtual Virtual is a project worth looking forward to.

## 

## POAP æ„¿æ™¯æ¦‚è¿°

The last three decades brought huge technological shifts which enabled people to engage at a never-before-seen scale. The new mechanisms invented were much lower friction, creating explosive rates of interaction and information transfer. Attention, engagement, participation and labor all became far more dynamic to accommodate the growth of the average humanâ€™s network.

è¿‡å»30å¹´å¸¦æ¥äº†å·¨å¤§çš„æŠ€æœ¯è½¬å˜ï¼Œäººä»¬èƒ½å¤Ÿä»¥å‰æ‰€æœªæœ‰çš„è§„æ¨¡å‚ä¸å…¶ä¸­ã€‚æ‰€å‘æ˜çš„æ–°æœºåˆ¶æ‘©æ“¦åŠ›æ›´å°ï¼Œåˆ›é€ äº†çˆ†ç‚¸æ€§çš„äº’åŠ¨å’Œä¿¡æ¯ä¼ é€’é€Ÿåº¦ã€‚æ³¨æ„åŠ›ã€å‚ä¸åº¦ã€å‚ä¸å’ŒåŠ³åŠ¨éƒ½å˜å¾—æ›´åŠ åŠ¨æ€ï¼Œä»¥é€‚åº”æ™®é€šäººçš„ç½‘ç»œçš„å¢é•¿ã€‚

Where it was once impossible to imagine knowing more than a hundred fifty people, humans today wind up with far larger networks facilitated by platforms and algorithms that curate digital environments on our behalf. We keep in touch with each other across continents, are constantly exposed to new ideas, and the information we need is never too far away.

åœ¨è¿‡å»ï¼Œäººä»¬ä¸å¯èƒ½æƒ³è±¡è®¤è¯†è¶…è¿‡150äººï¼Œä»Šå¤©çš„äººç±»åœ¨ä»£è¡¨æˆ‘ä»¬ç­–åˆ’æ•°å­—ç¯å¢ƒçš„å¹³å°å’Œç®—æ³•çš„æ¨åŠ¨ä¸‹ï¼Œæ‹¥æœ‰äº†å¤§å¾—å¤šçš„ç½‘ç»œã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨å„å¤§æ´²ä¿æŒè”ç³»ï¼Œä¸æ–­æ¥è§¦æ–°çš„æƒ³æ³•ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦çš„ä¿¡æ¯æ°¸è¿œä¸ä¼šå¤ªè¿œã€‚

This dramatic evolution in the way that we connect at scale came with consequences. Our generationâ€™s struggle is marked by an unprecedented breakdown of social trust, a shift towards isolation, and a general sense of disconnectedness. Building deep and valuable relationships with each other and within our communities isnâ€™t a process weâ€™ve figured out how to scale.

æˆ‘ä»¬å¤§è§„æ¨¡è¿æ¥æ–¹å¼çš„è¿™ç§æˆå‰§æ€§æ¼”å˜å¸¦æ¥äº†åæœã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬è¿™ä¸€ä»£äººçš„æ–—äº‰çš„ç‰¹ç‚¹æ˜¯ç¤¾ä¼šä¿¡ä»»ç©ºå‰å´©æºƒï¼Œè½¬å‘å­¤ç«‹ï¼Œä»¥åŠæ™®éçš„è„±èŠ‚æ„Ÿã€‚å½¼æ­¤ä¹‹é—´ã€ä»¥åŠåœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç¤¾åŒºå†…å»ºç«‹æ·±åˆ»è€Œæœ‰ä»·å€¼çš„å…³ç³»ï¼Œå¹¶éå¦‚æˆ‘ä»¬æƒ³é‚£èˆ¬å¤§è§„æ¨¡æ‰©å±•ã€‚

This state of affairs is part of the turning wheel of progress. As humans, the challenge we face today is scaling culture: the process by which we feel affinity with the people around us. Increasing the fluidity of the various core components of the social fabric moved us towards a future where the probability that someone finds the people they are meant to engage with is higher. Now itâ€™s time for us to turn our attention to the problem of reinforcing those connections.

è¿™ç§çŠ¶æ€æ˜¯è¿›æ­¥çš„è½¬è½®çš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚ä½œä¸ºäººç±»ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä»Šå¤©é¢ä¸´çš„æŒ‘æˆ˜æ˜¯æ‰©å¤§æ–‡åŒ–è§„æ¨¡ï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å‘¨å›´çš„äººæ„Ÿåˆ°äº²å’Œçš„è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚å¢åŠ ç¤¾ä¼šç»“æ„çš„å„ç§æ ¸å¿ƒç»„æˆéƒ¨åˆ†çš„æµåŠ¨æ€§ï¼Œä½¿æˆ‘ä»¬èµ°å‘äº†è¿™æ ·ä¸€ä¸ªæœªæ¥ï¼šæœ‰äººæ‰¾åˆ°ä»–ä»¬è¦æ¥è§¦çš„äººçš„æ¦‚ç‡æ›´é«˜ã€‚ç°åœ¨æ˜¯æ—¶å€™è®©æˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠæ³¨æ„åŠ›è½¬å‘åŠ å¼ºè¿™äº›è”ç³»çš„é—®é¢˜äº†ã€‚

If the last three decades of social technology solved for the problem of scaling the transferability of social primitives like information and attention, the next several will deal with increasing the depth of our engagement with our social surroundings under conditions of scale. New social technology will need to be invented to facilitate a greater depth of experience, connectedness, and self-understanding. This is what POAP set out to address.

# P.O.A.P. ç†è®º // Theory of P.O.A.P.

P.O.A.P. (short for Proof of Attendance Protocol) was established in 2018 by [@worthalter](https://twitter.com/worthalter), [@gomox_ar](https://twitter.com/gomox_ar), [@dmf7z](https://twitter.com/dmf7z), and [@reneil1337](https://twitter.com/reneil1337), and launched at ETHDenver 2019 as a community run project. The protocol was developed for the preservation of memories as digital records, which are minted as ERC-721 tokens and stored on the blockchain.

P.O.A.P.ï¼ˆå‡ºå¸­è¯æ˜åè®®çš„ç®€ç§°ï¼‰ç”± [@worthalter](https://twitter.com/worthalter), [@gomox_ar](https://twitter.com/gomox_ar), [@dmf7z](https://twitter.com/dmf7z), å’Œ [@reneil1337](https://twitter.com/reneil1337) äº2018å¹´å»ºç«‹ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨2019å¹´ETHDenverä¸Šä½œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªç¤¾åŒºè¿è¡Œé¡¹ç›®æ¨å‡ºã€‚è¯¥åè®®æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†**å°†è®°å¿†ä½œä¸ºæ•°å­—è®°å½•è¿›è¡Œä¿å­˜**è€Œå¼€å‘çš„ï¼Œè¿™äº›**è®°å¿†è¢«é“¸æˆERC-721 NFT å¹¶å­˜å‚¨åœ¨åŒºå—é“¾ä¸Š**ã€‚

The word *memory* is used here in a somewhat broad sense. In order to qualify as being worthy of a POAP, an event needs to be:

(1) **Social**: the event should connect members of a group;

(2) **Memorable**: the event should be something worth remembering; and

(3) **Time bound**: POAPs exist to commemorate moments or periods in time.

Any qualifying memory can be captured by an issuer, and distributed to collectors in remembrance of a special moment shared by the group. At the core, POAPs are NFTs minted in recognition of a moment that created equity in the relationship between its holders.

The founders of the Proof of Attendance Protocol discovered a way to capture this value, by taking the memory of what happened, and minting it as a token with the ability to provide holders some future utility at the discretion of the issuer.

POAPs that are older (such as early ETHDenver or DevCon souvenirs) as well as those carrying work from well-known crypto-artists, often carry high collectible value.

A consequence of the structure and intended usage of the Proof of Attendance Protocol is an ability for issuers to create utility for their collectors at any point in the future. Being able to provide value directly to people who invest energy into the community is a powerful tool for generating social cohesion.

The plethora of products in the POAP ecosystem is web3â€™s best kept secret. The POAP ecosystem has integrationsâ€¦

* for issuance (from hacks like MailMerge and KryptoSign, to software like MetaZooâ€™s Decentraland POAP Dispenser and the DEGEN bot for Proof of Attendance in Discord, to hardware like IYKâ€™s NFC dispensers for POAP issuance IRL);
* for utility (including gating content with MintGate, gating communities with Collab.Land, as well as real-time voting and raffles with POAP.vote and POAP.fun); and
* for building community (POAP.gallery â€” IYKYK)

â€¦ which all exist with the intention of making it possible to assemble groups based on the alignment of members with certain ideas, activities, missions, or forms of recreation; to reward members of those groups with value as well as emotionally salient experiences; and to grow those communities by finding new members who are conceptually aligned.

POAP is a tool for humanity to value social equity; to cultivate it in our communities; and to nurture the groups that contribute to its accrual.

POAP æ˜¯äººç±»é‡è§†ç¤¾ä¼šå…¬å¹³çš„å·¥å…·ï¼›åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç¤¾åŒºä¸­åŸ¹å…»ç¤¾ä¼šå…¬å¹³ï¼›å¹¶åŸ¹è‚²æœ‰åŠ©äºç¤¾ä¼šå…¬å¹³çš„ç¾¤ä½“ã€‚

# Identity primitives

> *I am my collection and my collection is me
> â€” (@[izgnzlz](https://twitter.com/izgnzlz/status/1450623390260342784?s=20))*

In addition to being a tool for emergent social cohesion, the Proof of Attendance Protocol provides simple to deploy primitives for evidence-based, bottom-up assembly of individual identity.

The broad range of events and issuance mechanics made available by extending the meaning of â€œattendanceâ€ to include any form of attestation allows a POAP collection to present an extremely precise, reliable, and publicly verifiable reflection of a human being.

POAPs come in different flavors. ([source](https://twitter.com/poapxyz/status/1426200382712082437?s=20))

POAP issuance mechanics are arguably some of the most exciting areas of development in the POAP ecosystem, as they allow us to capture the range of value created by human social activity. POAPs are issued as proof of attendance, proof of participation, proof of competence, proof of achievement, or proof of belonging, potentially reflecting the full range of roles, values, and interests that contribute to a personâ€™s understanding and expression of her identity.

This, in addition to the diversity of social contexts where one can theoretically receive POAPs, in combination with the decentralized aspect of the protocol (meaning, issuers drop POAPs independently of one another) allow for an infinitely precise snapshot of a collectorâ€™s life narrative.

The fact of all this activity occurring as part of a standardized protocol on a public ledger makes reading this story as easy as scanning an Ethereum wallet.

The societal implications of an open-access, reliable record of someoneâ€™s participation in the world are immense. A POAP collection at some level, can be assembled to represent a hyper-granular image of a passionate collectorâ€™s life in real time.

However, thereâ€™s a second important mechanism at play for collectors in using the protocol:

> *Collecting POAPs makes you more likely to do something you were probably going to do anyway.
> â€” ([@superphiz](https://twitter.com/superphiz/status/1474773117167882259?s=20))*

## Positive externalities of showing up

In the real world, reward profiles for taking action are generally positive:

* Going to that party may mean meeting a new friend or your soul mate;
* Attending a talk on your area of expertise may lead to your next big project or job opportunity;
* You may have your next moment of inspiration at the art exhibit or show you wanted to visit.

However, these reward profiles are somewhat random. While doing things certainly is much more likely to lead to good outcomes than not doing them, its also entirely possible that any one particular adventure doesnâ€™t lead to anything in particular.

The brainâ€™s reward circuit tends to initially generate good feelings as a result of good outcomes. Habits are formed when triggers generate the good feelings in anticipation of the behavior that leads to the good outcomes, but this takes a streak of triggers leading to behavior that produces desired (and usually, predictable) outcomes.

The difficulty in reinforcing the desired behavior when outcomes are random is why developing a practice of showing up can be so hard. On the other hand, the positive externalities of doing things we believe we ought to be doing are immense: every time you engage in the practice of being yourself, you expose yourself to a positive-skew distribution of outcomes that might make your life substantially better.

Modern social products like Twitter, Reddit, LinkedIn, MeetUp, Facebook, Instagram and others are a double-edged sword when it comes to the optionality â€” neurobiology tradeoff.

On the one hand, the internet-connected subset of the human population has more ideas, practical guidance, opportunity, connectivity, and preservation capacity than we ever have. For the first time, we have access to the kind of technology that allows us to engineer good luck if we use it well, expanding the horizons of the possible to an incredible extent.

On the other hand, these products are so reliable at delivering reinforcement for the behaviors theyâ€™re designed to enable (as opposed to the ones that create value in our lives), that they are vastly more habit-forming to engage with than the real world is. They dampen the bias to action by providing a far more consistent reward profile for outcomes that do nothing for us.

As a product, POAP turns this dynamic on its heels by providing an instant, tangible reward for engaging with your interests, communities youâ€™re close to, causes youâ€™re passionate about, and brands you believe in. Collecting POAPs creates positive externalities by hacking human neurobiology to reinforce behavior that creates the positive skew outcome distribution weâ€™re unconsciously after when we practice showing up.

In the process of collecting POAPs, you find friendships, unexpected opportunities, community, and make truly remarkable memories. POAPs are a guaranteed reward for doing something you wanted to do because it would probably be good for you, and the process of collecting them is one of fundamentally increasing your bias to action.

POAP collectors ultimately become more vibrant versions of themselves.

# Formally introducing POAP inc.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/HJSTNebB4vBNNBB1kocfg.png?height=699&width=1400)

Every Big Tech company to come out of Silicon Valley believed it was changing the world for the better.

To date, this took the form primarily of breaking down the barriers to transferring information, attention, and social capital through time and space. Transforming these relational primitives into group cohesion, however, requires a different mechanism.

Group cohesion gives meaning to our lives. As social animals, human neurobiology requires us to find a sense of belonging in order to feel higher satisfaction, and to reduce our levels of tension and anxiety. Our communities are systems that protect us, nurture us, and give us what we need to thrive.

In order to benefit from these support systems, we need to invest in them. By mobilizing our attention to create value for a group, we find a greater sense of belonging, while getting clearer on who we are as humans. This feedback loop ultimately creates healthier, happier, and more productive human beings with a rich tapestry of shared experiences.

The experiences that are created are as spontaneous and unique as the individuals creating them, making the memories irreplaceable. A reliable record of these shared experiences empowers humanity to accrue intrapersonal equity more efficiently, and to have its value recognized across various contexts. By arming people with the tools to come together, get invested, and drive value for their communities, we should begin to see a marked increase in humanityâ€™s quality of life. This is the essence of where weâ€™re going with POAP.

Living in a world where POAP is a fully adopted social technology means living in a world where:

1. Our social contexts are a more nurturing, cohesive, and deeply embedded part of who we are; and
2. Everyone has the opportunity to instantly see a high-definition image of everyone they run into; and
3. Every human has a mechanism for developing agency, and the intrinsic motivation to do what she is meant to do.

The global adoption of the Proof of Attendance Protocol will increase human potential and the rate of value creation by several orders of magnitude. We are building a world where people are clearer and more transparent about the best versions of who they are, more passionate about the conditions of the things they care about, and able to find others who are working on the same problems.

The immense potential to improve the overall human condition ultimately inspired the formation of POAP inc: a Delaware Corporation founded on September 9th, 2021 by [@worthalter](https://twitter.com/worthalter), [@toms0x](https://twitter.com/toms0x), and [@izgnzlz](https://twitter.com/izgnzlz).

POAP inc. is dedicated entirely to the realization of the vision made possible by the Proof of Attendance Protocol; an endeavor which will require global adoption of the protocol at individual and institutional levels, a fully developed platform and application layer, and an ecosystem of implementation specialists, dispatchers, managed service providers, and other organizations offering key support roles around POAP.

# Celebrating 4 months of POAP inc.

For a company not yet 6 months old, POAP inc. has a lot under the belt.

* We made it through two major hurdles in the industry events season â€” NFT NYC and Art Basel Miami.
* We executed legendary drops with the likes of XCOPY, Adidas, Budweiser, Coach, the US Open, and other household names.
* We doubled (and nearly tripled) the size of the POAP team, dramatically increasing the capacity we have in operations. Want to come work with us? Check the job board [here](https://careers.poap.xyz/)!
* We shipped a beta of a [digital check-in system](https://qr.poap.tech/#/); prototyped products for Twitter and other para-social platforms; and have several product launches weâ€™re sitting on quietly.
* We made strides in establishing the independence of the Proof of Attendance Protocol by establishing the [POAP Curation Body](https://medium.com/poap/introducing-the-curation-body-4ea21daf8e30), and creating a first take at the minimal infrastructure we need to support our community.

We did all this while manually reviewing approximately 17,000 events, supporting infrastructure for minting over 2M NFTs, and roughly doubling the number of passionate collectors in the POAP ecosystem.

We also had some hard lessons:

* Some of our ambitious plans were made impossible to execute on by our incessant battle with POAP farmers;
* Two cybersecurity incidents taught us hard lessons in incident response;
* Other standard growing pains related to explosive growth.

Weâ€™re proud to have ultimately come out on the other side stronger as a company, team, and group of people on a mission.

Throughout the process, weâ€™ve gained a lot of clarity on what the world we want to build looks like, and what it might take to get there. Nobody said it would be easy, but the unique blend of scrappy entrepreneurial disposition, nose-to-the-grindstone work ethic, and humanist philosophy that constitutes POAP inc. DNA has about three quarters of whatâ€™s needed to get the job done.

Itâ€™s with great pleasure that we welcome the last quarter â€” operational expertise with industry roots â€” to the POAP ecosystem, as part of the closing of our $10M Series Seed round, co-led by **Archetype** and **Sapphire Sport LLC**, with participation from web3 native funds (***Collab Currency***, ***1KX***, ***Libertus Capital***, ***Red Beard Ventures***, ***6th Man Ventures***, ***Delphi Digital, A Capital***), funds with strong ties to media and entertainment (including ***Sound Ventures***, ***Advancit Capital***, and ***The Chernin Group***), as well as around 50 strategic angels (the counsel and support of which without, POAP wouldnâ€™t be the amazing ecosystem it is today). The structure of the round is deeply representative of the unique position we occupy at the intersection of web3, media and culture, and infrastructure developed as a public good.

We intend for this raise to be the first along the road to our building a better POAP, with substantial allocations carved out for the kickstarting and development of the POAP issuer support ecosystem; investment into the platform and application layer; and the formal establishment of the POAP Foundation, an entity solely dedicated to preserving the spirit and ethos of the Proof of Attendance Protocol.

**TLDR; PonytaSwap Announces Public Testnet Launch on June 10th**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TTynwM2aC1hxUSPErR-_c.png?height=3456&width=6912)

## Launch Alpha Testnet

Weâ€™re excited to share with you all our alpha testnet launch, which will primarily focus on community building and bug bounty. Built on Rangers Protocol and compatible with the Ethereum Chain, PonytaSwap expects to serve more players not only from MixMarvel and DeHero but also other gaming projects on Ethereum.

With several advantages including high liquidity level, low price slippage, fast matching engine, outrageously low transaction fees, and high scalability, PonytaSwap provides exactly what every DEX user is looking for. Furthermore, Ponytaswap will soon offer liquidity mining pools with an attractive initial APY and more exclusive offers are coming up.

The launch will come with rewards for the very first adopters and users of PonytaSwap. Rewards calculations will take place from June 10th at 2 p.m. UTC onwards(Join our Telegram and Discord channels for live updates).

[https://test.ponytaswap.finance/](https://test.ponytaswap.finance/)

The first two batches of the trading pairs introduced are as follows in alphabetical order.

\*\*
1st batch\*\*

1. BTC/ ETH
2. BTC/ USDT
3. ETH/ USDT
4. RPG/ ETH
5. USDT/ DAI
6. USDT/ USDC

**2nd batch**

1. RPG/ HEROES
2. RPG/ MIX

\*\* Friendly reminder:\*\* There is no Ponyta token private sale or direct public sale other than certain angel investors who can participate in pre-sales. However, community members who take part in the testnet launch and report the bug will be allocated a small amount of Ponyta tokens. After the testnet launch campaign comes to an end on/by July 10th(TBD), all of the public distribution of the Ponyta tokens will go to liquidity providers through the farms only.

Campaignâ€™s Feedback & Comment form please find from here:

[https://forms.gle/yWauBpMwaPQD8ZYo9](https://forms.gle/yWauBpMwaPQD8ZYo9)

## How did we decide the first batch of the trading pairs?

We are the first DEX on Rangers Protocol. Our vision for PonytaSwap is to be the one-stop destination for trading FT & NFT on Rangers Protocol for all the users. We designed our first batch of trading pairs to point out the three objectives:

1. Bootstrap the ecosystem liquidity
2. Enable our users to trade Rangers Protocol tokens
3. Enable the users to trade with the high-quality trading venue: fast, lower fee, minimal slippage, and gamers friendly.

## How will the upcoming listings be managed?

The team will optimize the listing strategy, add the yield farming function and attract liquidity gradually during the first month of the launch(alpha testnet and beta version) to ensure users find their preferable trading pairs here on PonytaSwap. Next, we envision the community taking over the listing management in the near future. Everyone should have a say on what token pairs they would like to add to the liquidity pools.\*\*
\*\*

We hope that users come to explore the new ecosystem and stay for the community. Join us on Telegram and Discord for more updates!

body:
## Who are the BOLD?

We are a community looking to do bold moves in the realms of art, media and commerce.Â *Our members share a mission*Â of leveraging the positives of web 3.0 to execute these bold moves in democratising E-Commerce and Bold Media.

**Our ambitious plan is to execute a 100**Â **bold moves**, each getting grandeur & grandeur and have max fun doing so.. ğŸš€

We believe we can out-relate, out-communicate and out-execute traditional media & commerce. With the breadth and resource of a hive mind, we can forge new business models & execute these moves.

We intend to shape a better future for the entire commerce and benefit everyone in the process.Â **Collectively, we will change the world one bold step at a time.**

### D2C brands are not bold enough

D2C brands work in a centralised manner and work for just profits and not for the benefit of the community or the planet. We want to change that. By giving ownership, governance and voice to the frens of the bold.Â **Weâ€™re not here to fix it, weâ€™re here to re-invent it.**

### Advent of BOLD Media Era

The way we consume media is changing and we want to be at the forefront of this change. We want to create a new model for media that is owned and governed by the community. We want to create a new way of consuming and creating content that is more immersive and engaging. We want to use the power of the community to create a more decentralised and transparent media ecosystem.

We believe that the future of media is bold, and we want to be a part of it.

> **Community Ownership is the way forward and we believe in it strongly. We want people to own and shape their own experiences.**

We donâ€™t want to be just a brand, but a statement. That this is possible!

## Letâ€™s DAO it!

In a DAO, ownership rights, funding, and governance live on the blockchain.

By definition, DAOs are decentralized, meaning governance is not controlled by one person or entity. The rules and governance model are coded in smart contracts on the blockchain and cannot be changed unless voted on by the DAOâ€™s members.

A key aspect of DAOs is transparency. Proposals are discussed, voted on and documented publicly. Additionally, the model provides supply chain and financial transparency, with all transactions recorded on the blockchain.

BOLD DAO members will be able to participate in and vote on decisions for:

* BOLD Store
* Product Selection
* BOLD Branding
* Pricing
* Marketing/Advertising
* Product Development
* Distribution
* Causes/Charities

And the producers and purveyors we partner with as the foundation for our products and services will have a like-minded set of ethics and sense of purpose, ensuring the entire bold community ecosystem reflects our values.

# WRAP UP

In short here is the BOLD Master Plan :

* Start with a bold store - Build the worldâ€™s first community owned e-commerce brand
* Create value for the whole community and engage with bold media
* Do even more ambitious bold moves to accelerate the democratisation of media and commerce.

Okay bold frens, join us on this journey if you wish. LPGo.!

title: MoonFrost - An On-chain Farming Simulator Game
body:
Author: @!0xWang1 | @RealResearchDAO

## 1. Basic Information

### 1.1 Game Introduction

MoonFrost is a 2D pixel on-chain farming simulator game on Solana that launches soon. It integrates social interaction, life simulation and role-playing elements. The design inspiration comes from a series of popular free-to-play role-playing games such as "Stardew Valley" and "Animal Crossing".

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dYB-6yUD0OCSfCw0MC8ke.png?height=494&width=1240)

### 1.2 Roadmap

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/43VnZWeqhWhj3TH6_Ilqf.png?height=1210&width=1218)

**1.2.1 Milestone 1 - Trailer Build**

The expected time of arrival of this stage is mid-September 2022. The Trailer Build of the project is to combine and test the visual effects and playability of the game, which can be regarded as a semi-playable version of MoonFrost. The main purpose is to promote the game of MoonFrost.

**1.2.2 Milestone 2 - Alpha Build**

The plan for the second phase is to carry out Alpha Building while expanding the team and releasing NFTs. The official plan is to launch the first playable (Alpha) version of MoonFrost in the fourth quarter of 2022. It may not fully have all the functions of the game, but the core functionality of the game will be covered in the Alpha version.

**1.2.3 Milestone 3 - Global Launch**

In the third stage, MoonFrost is expected to release the official version of the game worldwide in the fourth quarter of 2023. The game is free to download and play, and the complete game version is rich in content. Players are expected to participate in the game for a long time.

At the same time, the sales of in-game pet NFTs will be launched before the third phase, which is the global release, and the specific time has not yet been determined.

## 2. Team & Investment Background

### 2.1 Team Information

Oxalis, established in August 2020, currently has a staff of about 20 people. The main members are located in the UK, and a few are located in other parts of Europe. The founder Ric Moore was previously the producer of the mobile version of "Stardew Valley", so they have a strong connection with "Stardew Valley", and their original slogan was: Build the Stardew Valley Metaverse.

**Founder: Ric Moore**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FqfnORhezeaaeUo6h_6-E.png?height=600&width=1128)

Ric Moore is the CTO and co-founder of Bossa Studio in London, UK, whose online game Monstermind won the BAFTA Award. Bossa Studio was acquired by Shine Group in 2012. Ric then co-founded a mobile game studio called The Secret Police, the developer of the free-to-play Japanese RPG Dragon Watch. At the same time, Ric is also the lead developer of the mobile version of the classic simulator game "Stardew Valley", which has been a huge success on both iOS and Android. In 2017, RicMoore entered the Crypto space.

**Art Director: Gina Nelson**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/xGUJ2qRb3cBMA-RqDcBCT.png?height=660&width=1240)

Gina is a senior designer from South Africa and the winner of the Develop 30 Under 30 award. She worked with Ric as the Art Director of Dragons Watch at The Secret Police before joining Mediatonic as Gears POP!â€™s art director. She has cooperated with big IPs such as Star Wars, Hasbro, Disney and so on.

**Technical Consultant: Alexis Bacot**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/R2qaQggtsjACI9po7JAD7.png?height=440&width=600)

Alexis has worked in AAA game companies including Ubisoft, MVM, Area Effect, etc.

### 2.2 Investment Background

The project announced on June 8 that it has received a $4.5 million seed round investment. Investors include Animoca, Blocore, Supercell, Pantera Capital, Griffin Gaming Partners and other institutions as well as a group of angel investors. Among them, Animoca, as a star capital of Gamefi, participated in the financing of MoonFrost, which implies that MoonFrost has its own uniqueness. Supercell is a Finnish gaming giant that produces world-renowned mobile games such as Clash of Clans, Boom Beach, and Brawl Stars. After Griffin Gaming Partners completed the over-subscription of its second fund, Fund II, up to US$750 million in March this year, it has become the largest game fund at present. MoonFrost is the first Web3 project they officially invested in.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/SObPPvTpOVIl7WuPfBWb5.png?height=762&width=1234)

## 3. Game Content

### 3.1 Story setting

MoonFrostâ€™s storyline is set in a lively world, where the seasons and weather change. Humans live in harmony with nature, and the world allows players to experience how their actions affect the things around them.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w-EwEX7pdPW3fAtu1B1io.png?height=700&width=1240)

Each player has their own piece of land, where players can grow crops, collect supplies and collect materials to steadily build their territory or customize their own unique avatar by earning NFTs. As the player's territory level increases, the territory will continue to attract new NPCs, each NPC provides players with new mission chapters, and players can obtain rewards and upgrades by completing missions.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hQq3o8gnUBonbWo-4OmEs.png?height=694&width=1240)

### 3.2 Gameplay & Details

**3.2.1 Custom Characters**

Before starting the game, players can name their character and their farm. You can choose hairstyles, face shapes, eye color, skin colors, and clothings for your in-game avatar.

With the expansion of the game world in the future, if players want to change the character image, there will be special shops and hair salons in the game, and even if they want to change their appearance, plastic surgeons will also be available in the game. At higher prices, players may also encounter mysterious potions that change your appearance during their adventures.

**3.2.2 Gardening & Farming**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7Yc2S4teBBuArwFaR0-a6.png?height=720&width=1238)

The core gameplay is farming/gardening. Players can buy seeds and saplings from merchants (NPCs). Carry out a series of operations of planting, watering, growing, harvesting, and selling.

If a player wants to plant crops on a land, they must first plough the land and clear the natural weeds in preparation for planting.

Weeds, grass and branches will naturally build up over time, and players will need to do some level of cleanup over a certain period of time to ensure the weeds are not overrun.

Players need to water and harvest crops as required during crop planting. Failure to do so will result in crops withering and then dying.

**3.2.3 Wild Animals**

Various creatures in different game environments appear randomly and do their own thing. Players getting too close will also scare away wild animals.
The main animals are as follows:

* Birds - Players will encounter various types of birds in the game. Some may try to eat your crops. Birds can be fed by purchasing bird feeders and bird food. Different birds eat different things.
* Squirrels - they live around trees and like to eat seeds and nuts. Players can feed them.
* Spiders - they appear around the house from time to time. You may want to dust off their cobwebs.

**3.2.4 Multiplayer**

Playing with friends will make MoonFrost more exciting to play. Players will be able to add other players as friends and then play together on a shared map.

This kind of simulator game is better for playing with a few friends than 1000 strangers. It's an intimate co-op experience where you can chat with friends, help each other farm, complete quests together, and go on adventures together.

**3.2.5 Township - Friendship, Love and Marriage**

There are a large number of NPCs (non-game characters) in the town. Among them are men, women and non-binary sex people of different ages and backgrounds. Players can interact with them, and they'll usually be happy to stop and chat with you.
Players can pursue single and eligible NPCs in the game and even date them. By maintaining a good relationship with them, players can eventually propose and marry NPC characters. Of course it's also possible to marry your real-life friends in-game.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6U4mqclUWGZOqfayn2y1b.png?height=696&width=1238)

**3.2.6 In-Game Animal Rescue and Charity**

MoonFrost cooperates with SweetFarm, an offline farm organization that adheres to sustainable development and implements animal rescue.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MFL-Qx8xHnNOxJLFKpcfg.png?height=578&width=1236)

MoonFrost will provide 1/1 unique custom NFTs for animals in SweetFarm for players to raise in their in-game homes. The financial proceeds from these NFTs will be donated to charities, MoonFrost will combine online and offline, and provide players with the opportunity to truly rescue animals.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DqWstKDpx5W9C3nuYBxiz.png?height=366&width=1240)

These animal NFTs that can be raised and taken care of by players will also be launched on the secondary market for players to trade, so that small animals are given their unique value as NFTs.

## 4. Token & Economics

### 4.1 Token Type

According to the information currently disclosed by the official, MoonFrost implements a single-token economy. As the gameâ€™s governance token, $FROST will be launched on Solana in the future. Holders can stake the tokens to earn yield interests.

At the same time, $FROST will also be listed on a staking platform such as Raydium on Solana, and holders can earn profits by adding liquidity to AMM. Yields on this can be very high at launch, but this amount declines as the liquidity pool grows.

### 4.2 Token Allocation

The total supply of $FROST is 1,000,000,000.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XNlP26FpudOLAIismFbxf.png?height=762&width=1240)

* Seed round (11.25%) - unlocked 9 months after $FROST is listed on CEX, 12.5% unlocked every 3 months for 2 years.
* Strategic Round (0.2%) - 100% unlocked when $FROST is listed on CEX.
* VC (3.52%) - The unlocking plan has not yet been determined.
* GEM Sales (0.03%) - 100% unlocked when $FROST is listed on CEX.
* Team (10%) - Locked to the game's global launch (expected Q4 2023). Then unlock 8.33% every 3 months for 3 years.
* Development (10%) - Locked for 6 months after listing on CEX. Then unlock 8.33% every 3 months for 3 years.
* Marketing - (10%) - 550,000 Unlocked in Token Generation Event. The rest are locked until 6 months after $FROST is listed on CEX. Then unlock 8.33% every 3 months for 3 years.
* Treasury (15%) - locked for 6 months after listing on CEX. Then unlock 8.33% every 3 months for 3 years.
* Ecological Fund (40%) - 666,667 $FROST are unlocked in TGE to fill liquidity pools. The rest are locked until 6 months after CEX listing. Then unlock 8.33% every 3 months for 3 years.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/XpahyWN6J4uN2FRk_8Czd.png?height=906&width=1240)

## 5. Others

### 5.1 Problems Blockchain Games Has Been Facing

**Barrier of Entry**

Most of the current blockchain games require players to spend money in advance to purchase specific game tokens through the exchanges to enter the game. For new players who have never been in contact with crypto and blockchain games, the process of purchasing tokens is relatively complicated. It's hard for newbies to figure out how to buy starter tokens. For those who have not yet become crypto enthusiasts, this is a barrier preventing them from actively participating in blockchain games.

Second, most games are ridiculously expensive to play, and some even require players to spend hundreds of dollars up front to get started (like Axie Infinity). This price burden will put off many potential players who are otherwise interested in the game itself.

**The Gamesâ€™ High Reliance on NFTs**

At present, the blockchain game market is full of games based on NFTs transactions. When the game is released, the price of NFTs is very cheap, but as the popularity of the game increases, the price of NFTs necessary in the game system will rapidly soar to the level that off-chain players and ordinary players cannot afford. The price of NFTs has been smashed to a disgustingly high price, which discourages existing players from playing the game. For game designers, of course, it is hoped that the price of NFTs will continue to rise, until the price reaches an unreasonable range and there are still people willing to take it, until the economic system similar to the Ponzi scheme will lead to the decline of games with high playability.

**The Dilemma to Attract New Players**

For the entire game market, blockchain games are still a very niche genre due to the high barriers to entry. And due to certain rules that the game development industry has to abide by, many blockchain games are also unable to be listed on the App Store. In particular, the fact that blockchain games themselves require on-chain transaction payment can circumvent Apple's payment system to sell in-game currency, which will result in the sales platform preventing blockchain games from appearing on the App Store.

**Declining Reputation**

Steam recently banned all crypto-related games from the Steam store following complaints from users. Many believe that the crypto space is full of scams, pimps, and Ponzi schemes.

**Low Content Quality**

Compared to modern PC and mobile games, the vast majority of blockchain games do poorly. Developers tend to come from a blockchain background rather than a professional gaming industry background. The overall experience for users is very bad, and the gold-mining mechanism in blockchain games may be difficult to understand. Even if many blockchain games mechanisms are understood, they will be found to be simple and uninteresting mechanisms.

**The Huge Difference In the Investment Return Between Early Players And Late Players**

In blockchain games, OG players can usually buy a large number of in-game NFTs and tokens at extremely low prices. In many blockchain games, these huge advantages accumulated in the early stage of low cost will seriously overpower the players who enter the game later. In the game of buying things with real money, the rich have a huge advantage over the poor. And the mechanism of how this money is used in the game is not fair to late-stage players. At the same time, the game becomes a mirror of the external world. The rich are privileged, and the poor suffer more. It magnifies capitalism and its flaws. Some blockchain games allow you to rent characters/lands from wealthy players, killing a lot of the fun in the game.

**The Myth From Playing to Earning**

For the participation of blockchain games, people play more for fun, or are they just doing this â€œjobâ€ to make money? So far, only Axie Infinity has made it possible for people in low-income countries to earn a living through gaming. However, the huge fluctuations in token prices caused by market sentiment have also brought the production ratio of many players who rely on game gold to make a living to a very low extent.

### 5.2 MoonFrostâ€™s Solution to the Pain Points

**0 Barrier of Entry**

MoonFrost hopes that by releasing a game that doesn't require any purchases to start playing, users will be able to install the game on their phone or computer for free. And no need to buy any tokens.

Whether or not to spend in game is optional for users. If they want to buy tokens, MoonFrost will develop a way to buy tokens directly in the game with one click button (similar to traditional games), rather than buying through exchanges and transferring it complicatedly.

**Equal game mechanics**

The ever-increasing price of expensive NFTs has turned gaming into entertainment for the rich, making games not for every enthusiastic player. Essentially, there is nothing wrong with selling the NFTs you own for a profit, but having to spend a lot of money to start playing a game is a bad design.

MoonFrost avoids this by making it free to play for all players. At the same time, the development team will regularly release a stable supply of limited-edition NFTs and update other game content to ensure that active players can afford or obtain NFTs through active game behavior. There will also be opportunities to obtain rare items that occasionally drop during the game, which can be valuable!

**Play-to-Earn nâ€™ Chill**

MoonFrost is committed to creating an immersive world where players are happy to invest their time and energy in the game and enjoy playing it. Playing games shouldn't be a chore or a source of some kind of stress. So MoonFrost's core gameplay won't be competitive or skill-based. Its original intention is to attract chill players who want to experience casual games and experience the real fun of games.

When the game rewards players with tokens, it encourages gold-farming players to be active. Even in order to make money, people will try botting to achieve autopilots, which brings many problems to the game developers. In these cases, both the player and the game itself are gradually detached from the original intent of the game.

MoonFrost suggested that the best way to avoid this is to simply reject any gameplay in earning tokens on a regular basis through repeated game mechanics. A better way is to let players acquire rare items (NFTs) through the game's variety of gameplay (rather than farming golds).

### 5.3 Concerns around MoonFrost

MoonFrost, which will be released on Solana in the future, has already shown its unique game style and operational concept before its official release. As a simulator RPG on-chain, MoonFrost also disclosed on its official website that it will adopt a full PVE mode in the early stage of the game. In the game mode, there is no mechanism in the game that may bring some "pressure" or "materialism" to players, such as player-to-player battles and competitions.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MNlvCuzq6IGnYtVeD9oxW.png?height=298&width=1240)

In the current Gamefi industry, where the competitiveness of the game itself is more important, MoonFrost's casual gameplay appears relatively bland. Under the premise of advocating fair games and relaxing gameplay, how to attract the relatively chill gameplay to gamers or on-chain users is a problem that MoonFrost could be facing at the beginning of the project.

MoonFrost is also facing scrutiny from app markets such as Apple and Google when the game is released. Although the two companies have not issued a clear ban on blockchain games, the developers still said that they may provide different versions for PC and mobile. Some of these features are only available on PC, such as generating profitable NFTs, etc.

In addition, MoonFrost itself also has a risk, which is the ecological vulnerability under the single-token model. Since Axie Infinity was born and achieved great success, almost the entire GameFi industry has adopted and learned from Axie's complex economic model of dual-currency + NFT.

The advantage of the complex economic model is that inflation is delayed. In Axie, the inflation pressure of AXS is transferred to SLP through the interconnection between AXS, Axie NFT and SLP, and the relatively stable price of AXS and NFT is realized, delaying the rapid decline of the currency token price. At the same time, it is also more convenient for the developer team to avoid the premature arrival of the death spiral by adjusting the loss ratio between multiple currencies.

Although the single-currency model is simple and clear, compared with the complex economic model, its control over inflation will be much weaker, and it will give the team less means of macro-control, except for buying back and limiting outflow

It is not ruled out that MoonFrost's economic idea is excellent, but at present, it has not been shown more clearly from the existing data.

In general, although MoonFrost also has many drawbacks. At present, there are not enough social, farming simulator and RPG type games in the crypto industry. I believe that MoonFrost's experienced and mature team is capable of pushing this type of game to a new climax of blockchain games.

title: Project Research: Dreamverse
body:
## Background

### As the concept of metaverse becomes popular, a lot of metaverse projects or contents without differentiation start to emerge. Traditional metaverse projects, such as Sand and Mana, have rich content, but their graphics are made in pixel style, with a single visual presentation and lack of immersion; The future development of metaverse will certainly combine with VR/AR/XR and other technologies to bring users a high-fidelity and immersion experience.

## Introduction

### The project to be analyzed is called Dreamverse, an Ethereum-based VR metaverse with social and entertainment properties that offers high fidelity and immersion, launching in early 2021. The project provides exclusive metaverse space for partners through parcels of land for sale by partnering with several worldwide stars and top IPs from film, animation and games.

### According to the official information, in December 2021, NBA star McGrady announced to join DV to build McGrady Manor;  In March 2022, Prushenko, the four-time Olympic figure skating champion, announced to join DV to build a home on ice; in December 2021, 10 mange works including "Astro Boy" by Japanese manga artist  Osamu Tezuka were signed to move into DV.  Other IPs such as Tron, OKX, Mexc, Global, Gate.io, SocialFi Project XTM, EVA, and "Wandering Earthâ€ have also announced their presence in the meta-universe ecosystem.

### The projectâ€™s client beta is in the countdown phase, and its official Twitter has announced 6 scene previews, also it will launch a VR channel entrance and online dynamic content editing function in Q4; The project has already sold 400 Land NFTs in January 2022 on OKX NFT marketplace, and raised 100ETH, which is about $400,000. Users can currently trade land NFTs at Opensea; 50% of its revenue is used to support the long-term development of the project, and the other 50% is used for staking rewards and content creator incentives.

## Funding

### In December 2021, raised 1.57M from strategy round, led by CGV FOF Asian, and raised 300K from IEO through Gate.io

## Now whatâ€¦ ğŸ‘€

Yes the market has tumbled, why? A lot of reasons, but mainly greed which led to a lot of people, as well as large CEFI projects and VCâ€™s leveraging huge amounts & then getting liquidated. 

I am not a financial advisor so take this with a pinch of salt and DYOR, but Iâ€™ll share some of my thoughts on how to get through these challenging times.

![...](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2lOsgf7_UJ7dGu0TUWEfB.png?height=1432&width=964)

The way I see it, there are a bunch of ways you can see this bear market. However I like to simplify it in order to stay sane and continue to work in the space, so Iâ€™ve simplified what I'm thinking into three separate viewpoints:

### 1) You were here for the ride, made easy money & now want out:

* Watch the news, constantly, 24/7
* Check your portfolio every 5 minutes
* Build up the fear inside of you
* Sell it all for a loss
* Tell everyone itâ€™s a scam 

### 2) If you donâ€™t want to get involved but want to keep buying:

* The easiest way is to DCA (dollar cost average), set these up as direct debits, standing orders or set a reminder (calendar, phone or train your dog to recognise payday & remind you to buy more magic internet money)
* Get a hobby, to keep you occupied & distracted from the price volatility
* Delete crypto price apps, to keep you sane & mentally healthy
* Orâ€¦ change the denominated currency to your chosen asset â€¦ ie. I buy mainly ETH so everything shows as the value in ETH, that way youâ€™re focused on accumulating.
  * 1 ETH = 1 ETH 
  * 1 BTC = 1 BTC

### 3) If youâ€™re looking to stay involved in the space

* Do all of the above including:
* Get excited, now is the time that people who believe in the technology & values really show who they are
* Get ready for the â€œI told you soâ€œ & â€œIt was all a scamâ€œ â€¦ There will be a lot of them, just smile & nod/wave.
* If youâ€™re wanting to get involved in the space:
  * Join DAOâ€™s, learn more, grow your network, use your skills to help other people, communities & projects
  * Contribute to open-source projects, get some more experience/exposure 
  * Join a web3 company, people who follow the hype will drop off, meaning instead of being 1/1000 applicants youâ€™ll be 1/100 applicants, so you have so much more chance to land the role that youâ€™re after.
  * DCA, keep stacking those money legos

![...](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WvocHO9QPfA9s82PN3En1.png?height=1094&width=1330)

As for me, Iâ€™ll be doing the latter, DCAâ€™ing into magic internet money, learning & getting involved in a few DAOâ€™s.
